title: Bolsonaro’s political future hangs in the balance as Brazilian court case begins
description: Brazil’s top electoral court on Thursday began hearing a case that could torpedo the political future of former President Jair Bolsonaro by rendering him ineligible for public office for eight years.

title: Debris from missing Titanic submersible found, passengers presumed dead
description: After four days of searching for the missing submersible that was exploring the Titanic’s wreckage, a Canadian deepsea robot spotted debris from the vessel. The five people on board are presumed to be dead. NBC News’ Tom Costello has the latest updates.

title: Coast Guard speaks on discovery of Titanic submersible debris
description: Coast Guard Rear Admiral John Mauger speaks with Lester Holt about the debris found from the missing submersible exploring the Titanic’s wreckage.

title: Watch Indian PM Modi's full address to Congress
description: Watch Indian Prime Minister Modi's full address to a joint meeting of Congress as part of his state visit to Washington, D.C.

title: Vatican sends Bolivia diary of late priest who allegedly confessed to abusing minors
description: The Vatican has sent to Bolivia the diary of the late Jesuit priest Alfonso Pedrajas who allegedly confessed to abusing dozens of minors in the country.

title: New Zealand PM says Xi Jinping not a ‘dictator’ after Biden remark
description: New Zealand’s Prime Minister Chris Hipkins told reporters he did not agree with President Joe Biden’s remark that Chinese leader Xi Jinping was a dictator. China also slammed Biden’s comment as “absurd” and a “provocation.”

title: Titan passengers share eerie accounts of safety issues on the submersible's past expeditions
description: The Titan was touted as a groundbreaking submersible that could give tourists the extraordinary chance to visit the deep-sea grave of the Titanic — but past passengers have since shared chilling accounts of safety issues, communication failures and design concerns.

title: Coast Guard says missing submersible passengers are presumed dead
description: The U.S. Coast Guard held a press conference after submersible went missing while exploring the Titanic wreckage, saying that the five-person crew is presumed to have not survived.

title: What's the appeal of extreme adventures like the missing sub? A friend and fellow billionaire explains
description: It’s not for everyone but, for a certain type of adventurer, descending to the depths of the ocean inside a small and cramped vessel means “doing something extraordinary,” a friend of two of the people aboard the missing Titan submersible told NBC News Thursday.

title: Coast Guard says debris field discovered in search area near Titanic
description: The U.S. Coast Guard announced that a debris field has been discovered in search area for OceanGate Titan submersible, but it is still unknown if the debris is related to the vessel. NBC News' Kristen Dahlgren reports.

title: Choi Sung-bong, 'Korea's Got Talent' singer and cancer scam celebrity, dies at 33
description: Choi Sung-bong, a male singer who was the runner-up in the 2011 edition of “Korea’s Got Talent” talent show, died on Tuesday.

title: Exhibition honors Caribbean children left behind by post-World War II migrants
description: An exhibition at London’s Black Cultural Archives opens Thursday to mark 75 years since Caribbean migrants arrived in England on the ship Empire Windrush.

title: House Democrats push Biden admin on 'next steps' in helping Venezuelans
description: Democrats sent a letter to the Biden administration asking for specific timelines to  ease sanctions, facilitate funds and increase ties to help Venezuelans.

title: ‘Taylor Swift law’ introduced to criminalize ticket scalping in Brazil
description: A Brazilian lawmaker has introduced a bill, nicknamed the Taylor Swift law, to address scalpers that many fans say have made obtaining legal tickets for the singer’s "Eras Tour" nearly impossible.

title: Modi to address joint session of Congress as U.S. and India forge closer ties
description: Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi will deliver a speech to Congress on Thursday in a sign of growing ties between the world's two largest democracies.

title: Deadly gas explosion at barbecue restaurant rocks crowded China street
description: At least 31 people were killed after a massive gas explosion at a barbecue restaurant in northwestern China tore through a busy street. About an hour before the explosion, employees noticed the smell of cooking gas and found a broken valve on a gas tank in the restaurant that reportedly sparked the blast.

title: Moscow court upholds ruling to keep U.S. journalist Evan Gershkovich in detention until late August
description: A court in Moscow on Thursday upheld an earlier ruling to keep Evan Gerhskovich, a Wall Street Journal reporter arrested in Russia on espionage charges, in detention until late August, rejecting the journalist’s appeal.

title: New Zealand PM disagrees with Biden, says China's Xi not a ‘dictator’
description: New Zealand Prime Minister Chris Hipkins said Thursday he did not agree with President Joe Biden’s remark that Chinese leader Xi Jinping was a dictator.

title: Ukraine strikes key bridge to Crimea used by Russian military
description: Ukrainian missiles struck the Chonhar road bridge connecting occupied Crimea with Russian-held parts of the southern Kherson region overnight, forcing traffic to be diverted to a different route, Russian-appointed officials said on Thursday.

title: Expert examines rescue possibilities for missing submersible
description: NBC's Gadi Schwartz talks with UCSD research oceanographer Dr. Jules Jaffe about some of the options for rescuing the Titan sub and what may be happening to the missing vehicle.

title: Cooking gas explosion kills 31 people at a barbecue restaurant in China
description: A massive cooking gas explosion at a barbecue restaurant in northwestern China killed 31 people and injured seven, Chinese authorities said Thursday.

title: Death toll rises as violence in the West Bank continues
description: Hundreds of Israeli settlers have invaded a Palestinian town and set fire to dozens of homes and cars. This comes after a Palestinian gunman killed four Israelis, including a teenage boy, in a nearby town.

title: At least 46 women killed in Honduras prison massacre
description: At least 46 women in a Honduras prison have been killed after gang members opened fire on the women in their cells, according to officials. The gang members lit the prison on fire making this prison massacre one of the worst in recent history.

title: Biden hosts Indian Prime Minister Modi at White House
description: President Joe Biden welcomed Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi at the White House for a private dinner ahead of a much larger state dinner scheduled for Thursday.
